well weekend ghost hunter I am not lol..yeah I agree on not making it a slo=
w sweep..which I don't..my sweeps you can's hear anywords just snipits so v=
owel sounds...BTW paranormal so to speak is my career..I do have a group(i'=
m the founder)=C2=A0but that is has nothing to bo with my business so to sp=
eak..I don't ghost hunt..thats what my group is for..

--- On Tue, 2/1/11, =
Urkel23 <urkel23@...> wrote:


From: Urkel23 <urkel23@...>
Subject:=
 [EVP-ITC] Re: Steve's Box #43
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Date: Tuesday, F=
ebruary 1, 2011, 8:18 PM


=C2=A0 




You can set the sweep as slow as pos=
sible if your a weekend ghost hunter, but not if you want to be taken serio=
usly.

You will never get anybody to believe your files are legit if you ca=
n clearly hear a dj from the radio, even if the word he said had good timin=
g to answer your question.

-Steve

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Ursula =
Kalin <kalinu@...> wrote:
>
> that's a good idea with the fast sweep..but n=
ot fair to ignore people files just because the sweep is slowers...it's lik=
e saying do it my way or it's not right... don't do=C3=82=C2=A0 super fast =
sweep however I set it so you only hear tibits of a station..so no full wor=
ds
> 
> --- On Tue, 2/1/11, Urkel23 <urkel23@...> wrote:
> 
> 
> From: Urke=
l23 <urkel23@...>
> Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Steve's Box #43
> To: EVP-ITC@ya=
hoogroups.com
> Date: Tuesday, February 1, 2011, 6:51 PM
> 
> 
> =C3=82=C2=
=A0 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> I always keep the sweep at a very fast pace, most don't =
like it like that. I trained myself to listen that way, i never get questio=
ned by the skeptics.
> 
> If you hear a voice that's crystal clear, it's mo=
st likely just radio. The communication doesn't come over that way usually.=

> 
> I would suggest a test for anybody on this forum. Set you ghost box a=
t a super fast rate, then just sit back and listen. After a while you will =
hear them talk, but you have to get used to listening that way.
> 
> I feel=
 that it's the only legitimate way to do this. Just my opinion on that topi=
c. If i hear someone's file with a slow sweep, i ignore it as communication=
 for the most part.
> 
> -Steve
> 
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Adria=
na Jones" <adrianamjones@> wrote:
> >
> > On your FM 
> > at second 10-12 I=
 hear "telephone" and a fainter "hello?" I've gotten one or two "telephone-=
hello" voices myself. Very interesting. 
> > 
> > at about second 18 "you'r=
e/its so beautiful" a high soft female voice, I've gotten this message befo=
re and have also noticed it on others' files too. These along with the "I l=
ove you"s are a good sign to hear, it means whoever is on the other side is=
 feeling happy right now.
> > 
> > around sec 33-35 a man says quickly "I'v=
e paid a bit cause of you"
> > 
> > sec 42-43 "wait, just come" harmonic/si=
nging higher pitch
> > 
> > sec 44-45 "the people are talking to me" also h=
armonic/singing higher pitch, I think in response to the message at sec 42-=
43
> > 
> > sec 46-48 "you must do it"
> > 
> > sec 49-51 "did you say do t=
hat?" another high synth voice
> > 
> > at 1:02 there's the "I love you" :)=

> > 
> > there are so many more communications just on your FM sample, but=
 some are too quick/blurry to decipher quickly, but there are definitely wa=
y many more!
> > 
> > AM sample:
> > 
> > wow, I hear so much am not sure w=
hat's communication and what's just radio, I'm also not used to listening t=
o am... what's the sweep speed, will it be possible for any full words to c=
ome through at all? If not, then you've got a heck of a lot of stuff going =
on... I heard something about obama twice and have only listened through ab=
out half of it.
> >
